items.raw_desc: Hibakód olvasó ANCEL AD530 OBD-II:The ANCEL AD530 is a professional OBD-II diagnostic scanner that combines high-end engine scanning features with advanced battery testing. It offers support for all 10 OBD-II modes and provides in-depth analysis of error codes, live data and emission readiness. Thanks to the improved STM processor and colour TFT display, operation is fast, clear and intuitive even for less experienced users. The ANCEL AD530 diagnostic device is thus suitable for both professional mechanics and advanced drivers who want to have a detailed overview of the condition of their vehicle. The scanner is compatible with a wide range of gasoline, diesel and hybrid vehicles manufactured since 1996 in the USA, since 2003 in Europe and since 2005 in Asia. It can read and delete error codes, display graphical live data, test lambda probes and test EVAP systems. Jejich používání je v první řade zábava pro každého a slouží také jako výborný nástroj pro rozvoj pohybové koordinace, citu pro rytmus a hudebního sluchu.
